pages.text: $(li)Puff Bugs are tiny neutral creatures that can be found in the Poise Forests of the End.$(br)$(li)When they find an unpollinated Bolloom Bud, they will polizate it and obtain the Levitation Effect for a few minutes.$(br)$(li)After that, if you give a Balloom Fruit to a Puff Bug, it will drop a Baloom Bud.
Puff Bugs can be breed, you only have to give them Tall Poise Bushes.
